name: Night Shift (itch) (unitywithwika)
description:
It's Friday night. I'm alone in the office doing my night shift. our company was going bankrupt.  But all of a sudden our profits started to skyrocket... almost like our boss made a deal with a demon.

Instructions: 

  • Survive the night shift 
  • Use your trusty flashlight to temporarily banish the demon ( You need to aim at its head)
  • Complete the tasks on your pc but beware of the demon
